predicate.note: Frames file for 'squelch' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 43.2, Framenet entry Motion noise.

roleset.name: stifle, suppress

example.name: active
example.text: The ``Fairness'' Doctrine's enthusiasts are incumbents in the House who know the rules squelch lively discussions on broadcasts, deterring feisty challengers.

roleset.note: This usage has nothing to do with the verbnet or framenet class, of which this verb is a pretty marginal member anyway.
